name: v1_inflation
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool inflation_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Get current inflation data for the dozens of countries. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/inflation.
API description: Fetches current monthly and annual inflation percentages from the API Ninjas Inflation API endpoint.

type.description: inflation indicator type. Can be either CPI (Consumer Price Index) or HICP (Harmonized Index of Consumer Prices). If not provided, the CPI will be used by default.
